parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable / disable [[Post process effects]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> If effect fails to get enabled (can check it with [[ppEffectEnabled]]) try adding a little [[sleep]] in front of it. </value></part></template> 

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> effect [[ppEffectEnable]] enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> effect: [[String]] - name of the effect

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> effect [[ppEffectEnable]] enable

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> effect: [[Number]] - handle of the effect

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value> effectArray [[ppEffectEnable]] enable

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value> effectArray: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s - array of effect handles

</value></part><part><name>p42</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"colorCorrections" [[ppEffectEnable]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_hndl [[ppEffectEnable]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[_hndl1, _hndl2] [[ppEffectEnable]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Post process effects]], [[ppEffectForceInNVG]], [[ppEffectDestroy]], [[ppEffectCreate]], [[ppEffectEnabled]], [[ppEffectCommit]], [[ppEffectCommitted]], [[ppEffectAdjust]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
